conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-fidelity 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation; wall thickness and corners are mathematically consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout. Minor mismatch: The linen cupboard by the entry is missing its internal partition door, rendered as just a wall niche.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout well. Kitchen and bathroom fixtures correctly placed. Bedroom 2 left empty as per generic 2D plan style.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Score slightly adjusted due to the glass balcony door and window materials being somewhat indistinguishable from solid openings at this scale.

detected_errors.description: Linen closet door/structure simplified near the main entry.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation of the source floor plan.
